name: Noland's land
description:
On a land with no land, Noland, jumps is way out of peril

game made for the game maker's toolkit game jam 2018, a genre without mechanic, i did the obvious and made a platform without platforms, there's even another game already called noland in this jam.....

anyways i don't usually make this kind of stuff, this is the first game jam i do all by myself

follow me on other sites to see my art and comics

https://mimic-txr.tumblr.com/

https://twitter.com/mimic_txr
